ac_button: A button related to the airconditioning unit, used for selecting different modes of operation
ac_dial: A dial related to the airconditioning unit, used for regulating tempertures
ac_switch: A switch related to the airconditioning unit, used for selecting different modes of operation
brake_lever: Hand brake lever, once raised ensures car is unable to move
brake_pedal: The brake pedal brings the car to a halt when pressed on
coolent_meter: The coolent meter present the currrent temperture level of the vehicle
cruise_button: The cruise control button allows the car remain at the same speed without pressing the gas pedal.
cruise_control_button: The cruise control button allows the car remain at the same speed without pressing the gas pedal.
dash_button: A dashboard button which sets the time displayed in the dash screen
dash_screen: The dash screen provides the time, date and other useful information
eject_button: The radio eject button ejects the CD currently inside the radio when pressed on.
emergency_button: The emergency button emits distress lights when pressed, used when requiring assistance or to notify other drivers to beware
engine_start_button: Button used to start the engine.
fuel_meter: The fuel meter displays the current level of fuel in the gas tank.
gas_pedal: The gas pedal controls the amount of gas being fed into the engine and thereby controls the speed of the vehicle.
gear_lever: A lever used to change gears while driving.
ignition_button: Button used to start the engine.
lights_button: A button used to tun the headlight on/off.
lights_dial: A dial used to adjust the level and setting of the headlights.
media_button: A button associated with the media system of the vehicle.
media_screen: A screen presenting various information depending on the media system, i.e. navigation programs, curresnt song playing or current radio station.
mute_button: When pressed, this button mutes the radio/media system.
radio: The vehicle's radio, could be operated by adjacent control elements.
radio_button: Buttons used for adjusting the radio station favorites and quickly swapping between them.
radio_dial: The radio dial regulates the AM/FM station or the volume lever of the radio system.
radio_switch: A switch used for tunring radio setting on/off.
rpm_meter: Displays the current number of rounds-per-minute the engine goes through
sd_slot: A slot to place a memory card to be used by the radio system
speed_meter: A meter displaying the current speed of the vehicle in kilometers per hour or miles per hour.
usb_button: Used to switch to from radio to usb configuration.
volume_button: USed to adjust the sound system volume.
wheel_button: Placed on the wheel for easy access to the driver, these buttons usually involve answering or hanging up a call, activate cruise control or changing setting in the sound system.
